title: Drusilla
content: Third wife of the Roman procurator Felix, for whom she had deserted her husband, King Aziz of Emessa. She was the youngest daughter of Herod Agrippa Ⅰ, the sister of Bernice, and the granddaughter of Herod the Great. While yet a very young woman, she heard Paul speak at Caesarea (
). She and Felix had a son, Agrippa, who perished in an eruption of Vesuvius.
